lead_paragraph: Sudanese President Omar Hassan al-Bashir has announced a one-month extension of his unilateral ceasefire in fighting with rebels in the country's war zones.
snippet: Sudanese President Omar Hassan al-Bashir has announced a one-month extension of his unilateral ceasefire in fighting with rebels in the country's war zones....

headline.main: Sudan's Bashir Announces One-Month Ceasefire Extension
headline.print_headline: Sudan's Bashir Announces One-Month Ceasefire Extension
